item.description: I totally agree. Deposit and fees are required in Bitcoin in order to avoid charge-backs, or why? Let's find some solutions!
item.content:encoded: I totally agree. Deposit and fees are required in Bitcoin in order to avoid charge-backs, or why? Let’s find some solutions!

item.title: By: NameHiddenToProtectPoster
item.dc:creator: NameHiddenToProtectPoster
item.description:
Hi. Not sure how I could supply the deposit or pay the fees for my first purchase of Bitcoin if I don't have any Bitcoin yet. Or am I missing something?
Is this a blocking point for those who don't have any Bitcoin at all, yet? If so, it's a barrier to entry into Bitsquare/the bitcoin ecosystem.
Tom
item.content:encoded:
Hi.
Not sure how I could supply the deposit or pay the fees for my first purchase of Bitcoin if I don’t have any Bitcoin yet.
Or am I missing something?

Is this a blocking point for those who don’t have any Bitcoin at all, yet?
If so, it’s a barrier to entry into Bitsquare/the bitcoin ecosystem.

Tom
